text:
e="preserve">The Enchantress is a fictional supervillain appearing in American comic books published by DC Comics. She was created by Bob Haney and Howard Purcell. The character made her first appearance in "Strange Adventures" #187 (April 1966).
The character, whose real name is June Moone, is seen as an antihero. She appears in the fifth volume of the "Suicide Squad" comic series, in which she is a regular member of the team and a romantic interest of Killer Croc.
The Enchantress was played by Cara Delevingne in the 2016 movie "Suicide Squad", which is part of the DC Extended Universe.
